11132121112111.content:
That night, something strange and magical happens and all the other toys in the pre-school come to life.

Suddenly you find yourself able to move and walk and talk again. But much to your chagrin, you're still dressed like a baby doll. You're still the size of a small doll and clad in a frilly, ridiculously short pink dress, a matching plastic pink diaper, a pair of tiny, lacy pink socks, and some black shoes with buckles.

You get up and walk around the room a bit, watching all the other toys slowly come to life as well.

“What's happening to us?” you ask in the voice of a tiny, girly, baby doll.

“This is a magic pre-school,” answers a friendly Barbie doll. “Once the sun sets, you can enjoy the powers of speech and movement. Relax, little girl. You're among friends here. Just make sure you're back on your shelf before sunrise in the morning.”

“But, you see, I'm not really a baby girl,” you start to say.

“Oh, I know!” giggles the Barbie doll. “I'm not a real lady either. I know we're all really just toys. I don't have any delusions of grandeur.”

“But in my case, I really am supposed to be human,” you say.

“What's the little baby girl talking about?” asked a stuff Panda Bear.

“I used to be a human,” you explain. “I'm really a thirteen year old boy named Bobby. But I got in a fight with my sister Sarah and, well, I know it sounds crazy, but somehow she changed me into a baby doll!”

“Are you serious?” asks a Raggedy Anne doll, frowning her button-nose face with doubt.

“I'm totally serious!” you squeak in your high pitched, baby girl voice. “I'm a boy named Bobby. Please, you guys here obviously know something about magic. Barbie, you said yourself that this is a magical place. There's got to be some way for me to change back to normal?”

“I'm sorry, but I've never heard of such a thing,” said Barbie sadly.

“Me neither,” said the Panda Bear.

“The Faery Queen might know of something,” suggested Raggedy Anne.

The other toys take you across the play room to a corner where some small, decorative, porcelain statues are perched on a shelf, high out of the reach of the children. After Raggedy Anne called out to the one of them, a pretty woman with long blond hair, gossamer wings, and a tiny, peach colored dress flew up into the air and gently fluttered down to where the four of you were standing.

“I am the Faery Queen,” smiled the porcelain statue. “Protector of this Toy Room. What troubles you, little baby girl?”

“I'm not a baby doll,” you say. Quickly, you run through the story of your predicament.

“Bobby, I'm afraid I do not possess the power to restore you to your original body,” the Faery Queen said gently. “But there are two things I can do for you, if you desire. You'll have to choose before the sun rises, though. Otherwise, we'll have to wait until tomorrow night. At daybreak, even I must return to being a mere decorative statue. Such is the power of this room.”

What are your choices?

You close your eyes to the sight of your sister's evil face, waiting to make something humiliating out of you. You re-enter the dark world of emptiness, unable to feel anything until you are wound up again.
1533322222122111.title: A Key for every Hole

choices: Wait, what the hell am I thinking?
15333222221221111.content: The next hour is spent in still, unmoving darkness. You hate this feeling, but you are becoming used to it. This black unending silence is slowly melting away your mind, but it almost feels right. When you are once wound up again, you are in a different place. It seems familiar to you, possibly from your old life. The words "dining room" are vaguely in the back of your mind, but you dismiss the thought. You have been wound up completely, and you can see various figures sitting at a large table. One of them starts to speak. "Bobby, you are now my servant. You won't respond to your old name, but to "Maid. You will also call me and my friends Mistress we when we talk to you"." You don't care too much about this. "Now, Maid, go make us some cupcakes!" "Yes, Mistress" you respond, in a woman monotone voice. You turn around and walk very slowly and jerkily, in time with your clock. These halls you are walking through look familiar, but it doesn't matter. All that you care about is being wound up, so you can serve your mistress and her guests. Your gears are turning and groaning, forcing you to walk forward, but you don't care. It is what you want to do. You think that maybe there is something affecting your mind, but you dismiss it quickly, jerkily opening a door and walking into a room. It looks like a kitchen, so you set to work making cupcakes for mistress. At one point you can see a mirror, and your outfit has changed to a blue maid uniform ( http://i01.i.aliimg.com/wsphoto/v0/49307... ) with a matching blue band tied around your forehead. You then spend the next hour making the cupcakes.
15333222221221111.title: A Maid to a Mistress

choices: Sarah breaks free and zaps Milly
The remote flies over to you, zapping you in mid air.
153332222212211111.content: You hear a door open, but you are too busy putting the cupcake mixture into the pan. "Sarah told me to turn your key back up when you wind down." You hear. You can't remember who Sarah is, but it isn't important. "Look at me when I'm talking to you!" The voice commands. "Yes, mistress." You say as you stop making the cupcakes and look up. It is one if Mistress's guests. You wait for her to dismiss you. "You know, I never liked you." She continues. "You always made fun of me when I came to stay. Do you remember that?" "No, mistress" is your involuntary reply. "Well, I do, and it was horrible. You were a mean person, and now I can punish you for it." She reaches over the bench to grab your neck, and pulls your head off. Your gears are still turning, so you are not alarmed. She places your head on the bench, facing your body. "Watch what I'm about to do, and remember." Says the girl. You don't reply. You just watch as your body is thrown to the ground. She starts kicking it. There are cogs flying everywhere. You can hear other voices yelling at the girl, one of them is mistress. They run over. "Milly, what are you doing? You've broken it" says mistress. The girl, Milly, looks shocked. "I'm sorry, I just wanted to punish Bobby for being mean to me. I didn't want to break it." She is crying, out of sadness or fear, you cannot tell. You see Mistress grabs her remote from her pocket and shoots a yellow ray. After a flash of blinding light, your head is back on your body, and you can feel your key turning and your cogs moving inside you. Mistress turns her attention to Milly. "Why do you always have to do this, Milly? You always break my stuff. You're so stupid!" Milly gets angry at this. "You know, you've been different ever since you called me about the remote. You think that you're better than everyone else. You can't just turn everyone into your servants, you know!" When Milly finishes, Mistress looks shocked. She starts adjusting the remote. A fight breaks out. Mistress and Milly are struggling for the remote, when suddenly...
153332222212211111.title: Punishment

1533322222122111111.content: ...Mistress breaks free from Milly's grasp, and quickly zaps her with the remote. She screams, but is quickly cut off. The light fades, and Milly has turned into a clockwork doll. She looks identical to you, with a maid uniform, clock, key and headband. Sarah walks up to Milly, an evil grin on her face. "Well, look at that, Milly. Looks like I can turn everyone I want into dolls. I just didn't think that you, my closest friend would be one of them. No matter, I still have my other friends here, who won't break my stuff, right?" She turns to the other girls, who nod with terrified faces. As Sarah turns back to continue talking, you wind down again, but you quickly get rewound. You awake next the other maid, who has been wound up, facing Mistress. "Now get back to making the cupcakes" she commands. "Yes, Mistress" you reply in unison with the other maid. You both jerkily start walking back to the bench where you are making the cupcakes. The others leave the room, so you are left with the maid to make the cupcakes.
1533322222122111111.title: Another Maid

15333222221221111111.content: After two more hours, you and the maid have finished making the cupcakes. You are now walking down the hallway, with the maid in front of you, carrying massive trays of cupcakes.There are two hundred cupcakes, half on each tray. The trays themselves are the most expensive china platters you could find in the kitchen. The cupcakes are topped with vanilla white icing. The dough was also made with a lot of sugar, so it should be to Mistress's taste. It was long and hard work, but it was worth it to be wound up and to please Mistress. As you approach the dining room, the girls are in conversation, when Mistress stands to turn to you and the maid, standing side by side with the trays. "Well, that took you long enough" she says, clearly disappointed. She looks at the two trays in front of her, and scowls. "What is this? Cupcakes need to be made with pink icing! We can't eat these!" she yells, flipping the trays up from your arms. A lot of the cupcakes land on yours and the maid's faces and dress, but some land on the floor. "Now," starts Mistress, "clean this mess up, and start again! I don't want to be disappointed again!" "Yes, Mistress" is the reply. One of the guests then speaks up. "Actually, they look nice, Sarah." One of her friends agrees. "Yeah, you didn't have to waste them. They did take a long time to make." Sarah turns to them, remote in hand. "Well then" she says, anger clear in her voice. "If you liked them so much, then why don't you clean them up!" The girls get zapped by the ray. They are now both maids along, along with you and the other maid. There are now four maids to four of Mistress's guests, as well as Mistress herself. "Now don't disappoint me AGAIN!" yells Mistress. The other guests look terrified. "Yes Mistress" you and the other maids say. You go to clean yourself off, while the other two maids clean the carpet, but you all wind down simultaneously. When you are wound up, you are in a line next to the other maids, broken cupcakes still on your face. The ticking is much faster and louder now. "While you were wound down, I overclocked you." This is what you hear, when you are wound up. "Now go and do as I said." "Yes, Mistress." You walk off out a different door this time, probably to a room where you will clean your uniform. You are moving three times as fast as a normal clock. You disappointed your Mistress, but you have the chance to make it to her with the second batch of cupcakes.
15333222221221111111.title: You finish making the cupcakes.

153332222212211111111.content: As you and the other maid reach what looks like a laundry, you take off your uniform and head band. Your white skin is visible, with your large clock blocking your breasts. While the uniform is made of think satin, it is still too delicate to wash in a machine. Instead, you spend the next hour hand washing your uniform. First, you put he dresses in a tub of cold water to let them soak. When you are done, you put them on a table and wash them with a cloth, scrapping the bits of cupcake from the dress and your face into a small bucket. After that, you fill a bucket with blue dye, remove the white belt and collar from your dress, lightly iron it, and put it in the bucket. When it is done, you remove it and place it under a heat lamp to dry. This has made your dress look sparkling new. After turning it over and waiting again, your dress is now done. You put it back on, the warmth feeling nice on your porcelain skin. The other maid has also done the same as you, her dress and headband looking shiny and new. You go back to making the second batch of cupcakes, your new speed filling you with great energy.
153332222212211111111.title: The Laundry

1533322222122111111111.content: When you return to the kitchen, the other maids have already started with the the batch of cupcakes, so you begin to help them. With double the people working three times as fast, you are able to make the cupcakes in fifteen minutes, giving them thirty five minutes to bake. While they are cooking, you try to think why you enjoy serving your Mistress so much. Maybe you were just born to be a servant, never realizing it, and being transformed into a maid made you realize it. Maybe being transformed into a clockwork doll affected your mind. Perhaps your mind is just the clockwork dolls mind, being adjusted and shaped by your ever turning cogs. Either way, you enjoy this new life. You try to think back to your old life. You can't really remember what it was like, or what you were like, but it was harder than this. Now, it just seems more simple. No more school to worry about, not having to worry about your social life. Now you don't have to care about what you wear, what you are going to do for a job. You just serve your Mistress, wearing your. How did you know, your Mistress before? Was she a close friend? No, you specifically remember her being annoying. Perhaps she was a relative, maybe your sister. Yes, definitely your sister. You were always superior over her, and now you are her servant. You don't care though. Things have changed, and you like them more this way, being a simple servant. Or, at least, you think that you do. Just just finish this thought when another maid walks in and stands next to you. There have also been some noises outside, probably more guests arriving. This maid is probably one of the new guests that displeased mistress. You then wait for the cupcakes to finish.
1533322222122111111111.title: Back to the Kitchen.

15333222221221111111111.content: You hear a ding, the cupcakes are done. You and the other maids start loading the cupcakes onto some trays. There are now four hundred cupcakes, each with pink icing. The previous china platters were broken, so some new ones were found. They are pink china, so they should please mistress as well. You and the other maids begin walking down the hall, two maids behind you and two in front, clocks ticking three times a second. As you reach the dining room, you see that mistress has invited more guests. There are now eleven guests and mistress. Some of the newer guests marvel at you as you walk in. One of them, however, looks unimpressed, her arms folded. "Big deal, Sarah," she says. "You paid a bunch of twins to serve us food. I don't see whats so good about it." Mistress turns to her, smiling. "Well, Kate," She says. "I have the power to make anyone do what I tell them, to make them my servant. That's what I did with these maids." The one Mistress called Kate smiles. "Then use it on me," she says. Looks like you will have a sixth maid. Mistress pulls out the remote. "Are you sure?" Kate shrugs. Mistress fires the ray at her. She is transformed into a clockwork maid before the eyes of all the guests. They scream, the one next to Kate falls off her chair. Mistress turns to her and says "Alex, could you wind her up please." Alex gets up, walks over to Kate's back and, hands shaking, turns her key. Kate's eyes open. Mistress tells her to stand next to the other maids. She replies "Yes, Mistress". Mistress continues, "Now, give us the food". You take the trays over to the middle of the table, within reach of all of the guests. Mistress takes one, observes it and takes a bite. "The icing could use some decoration," she says, "maybe some sprinkles, and the base is slightly overcooked. Other than that, it is adequate". You take this in eagerly. The other guests look too nervous to touch their cupcakes, but Mistress insists that they eat. You just stand there attention while they eat. At one point, you wind down, and you have to be rewound. When you are, Mistress and her guests have finished. She starts talking. "Now, maids, our guests will be staying for the evening. Go and prepare the guest rooms for their stay. They will want pink sheets on the bed. Once you are done, you will give the guest you are serving nightclothes, and take their clothes to wash. After that, you are to go to the closet of the room your are preparing, and stay there until you wind down. Now go!". "Yes, Mistress." is the unison reply. You walk off down the other hall to the guest rooms.
15333222221221111111111.title: More Guests

153332222212211111111111.content: The guest room you are cleaning clearly hasn't been used for a while. There is dust everywhere. Therefore, firstly, you take a duster from the closet and dust the entire room. Whether from your maid mind, or just general work ethic, you feel very satisfied once this is done, but your cogs won't let you stop. You then change the sheet of the bed. The pink sheets are soft, so it should be to the liking of the guest staying. You then stand next to the door at attention. About half an hour later, two guest walk in. They start chatting, not noticing you. "Y'know, I'm getting worried." The first one says. "I thought it would be fun at first, but I'm wondering when we're gonna leave". Her friend agrees. "Yeah, and I don't like doing just what Sarah wants to do. I don't want to sit there and talk to Kate's friends. She's horrible! I'm glad she got turned into a doll." Just then, one of the girls turns around to see you, staring just to the left of her. "Well, there's our maid." She walks over to you. "Maid, can I have my pyjamas, please?". "Yes, Mistress," you reply. You go over to the closet to grab her nightclothes, and the first girl takes off her clothes. Her friend protests, "Alice, what are you doing?! We can't take our clothes off I front of our Maid!". "Relax" she replies, "it's probably a girl, and even if it's Bobby, what can he do? He's just a doll." She reaches for her nightclothes, a pink shirt and trousers. Her friend gives in. "Fine". There are now two naked girls in front of you. You take their clothes and wait to be dismissed. Instead, the girls continue to chat while getting changed. After half an hour, one them asks "Shouldn't you be washing our clothes?" You reply "Yes, Mistress" and leave. You see no other maids when you wash their clothes, so the trip is uneventful. When you return, you walk in to the closet, hang up your dress on a clothes hanger and wait. You don't want to be wound down for the entire night, left in the emptiness, but that would be disobeying Mistress's orders.
153332222212211111111111.title: The Evening Chores

choices: You follow Mistress to her room.
1533322222122111111111111.content: You are rewound, and there is a light. When you are fully rewound, a figure come from behind you. It is one of the girls you are serving. "Sorry, to wake you, maid, but I had an accident." She is holding her bed sheets in her hands, and her friend is standing in the corner. "Can you change my sheets for me, and get some new clothes for me?". You reply to her, take her clothes and sheet and begin to walk out, but she says "Actually, can I wear your dress while I wait. I'm getting cold, and it does look very pretty". You see no reason to object, but you couldn't anyway. You say "Yes, Mistress", take off your dress and it to her. She puts it on and marvels at herself in the mirror. Just then, the door flies open and Mistress walks in. "What is this all this.." she stops and gasps. "Why are you wearing your servant'c clothes, Alice?" The girl wearing your dress is startled, and looks very scared. "I needed to change the sheets, and I didn't want to get cold". "Wait," Mistress starts, " Why did you need to change the sheets?" Alice looks embarrassed as she says "I wet the bed!" Mistress looks revolted. "That's gross, Alice. Why would I be friends with someone who still does that!" She pulls out the doll remote. "No!" Alice yells, pleading on her knees. "Anything but that!" Mistress doesn't care. The ray is fired. Alice doesn't even get a chance to scream. There is another maid stood in front of you. The other girl is still standing in the corner, sweating and panting. Mistress addresses her. "Now, Beth, I'm sending Kate to be your roommate. I decided to turn her back". Beth gets angry at this. "Are you kidding? I don't wanna sleep with her! She hates m..." she stops talking and gasps. "Hello, Beth" you hear from outside the door. "I'm glad to be spending the night with you." Suddenly, a doll walks in. It is Kate. She is wearing a pink nightgown, and has a box on her back. From the box, a key is turning. She also has a clock on her chest. Her skin is also pale, and her once loose hair is now tied up in a neat ponytail. "You there!" Mistress says to you, "Come to me!". "Yes, Mistress" you reply and walk out. Just as you leave, Kate turns to the other maid and says "Filthy servant, clean your mess up", and backhand slaps Alice. She replies "Yes, Mistress" and you walk out. You feel slightly sorry for her, but if her mistress wants to treat her like that, then that is fine.
1533322222122111111111111.title: The Swap

15333222221221211.content: The light of the ray is bright, and you can't see for several seconds. When you come to, you see a picture a of a ballerina in a fond golden frame. Hang on a second! That's no picture, that's a mirror! You study your body. You are wearing a pink ballerina outfit, with matching pink gloves and sleeves. You go to walk over to the mirror, but you can't seem to move your feet. After struggling to move your tutu out of the way, you see a pair of pink ballerina shoes on a black circle. You suddenly hear a creaking sound, and the turning of gears. There is another flash of light, and you see the ballerina in the mirror, with her hands in curtsy position. Normally, you would be outraged by this, but it feels right to you. Right that your sister should admire you. You just feel at peace now, with no worries at all.

Finally, one of them attaches to your head, and you have lost control to your body entirely. You can still think, but you have lost all feeling and movement. "Yay, I have my own Marionette doll!" Sarah exclaims. She begins moving you around, and you perform a jig. You feel humiliated and violated. "Let me go, Sarah!" You yell at her. She chuckles. 15333222221221222122.content: You see a gothic girl doll. You are wearing a black gown, with black stockings and shoes. The skin on your face and arms is pale white, and black lipstick, eyeshadow and mascara. Your hair is also black, left plain and untidy, hanging around your shoulders. "This is me now" you think to yourself. You feel incredibly depressed. You just want it to end. "That smile looks a bit bad" you hear Sarah say. "Perhaps I need to stitch it." She puts you down, and you sit limply on the floor, your hands on the floor either side of you. Sarah is rummaging around in some drawers behind you, humming an innocent tune. How can she be so happy when she is torturing you. You want to end all of this. She comes back and picks you up by the waist. You fall limp like a rag doll. Your monster of. Sister moves your face slightly. She begins Threading a needle through your mouth, forming a smile. The pain is searing, you would scream but your mouth is being forced shut. This is a fate worse than death. This is the worst torture possible. What could you have done to your sister to provoke this? "Ah, much better", your sister says. "The eyes are still looking sad though. Good thing I have some buttons!" Your head is lifted up. A massive metal pole is come straight at your eye. As it hits you are blinded in that eye. The pain is excruciating. From this one part of your body, you are filled with a black, jarring feeling. The same happens to your other eye. Your mind, your memories, your entire being is just this pain and sadness. When the pain decreases, you can see out of your button eyes, but you vision is tinted blue and dark. You are then raised to the mirror, and there you are: White as a ghost, dressed in black, with buttoned eyes and a sewn smile. It was threaded tightly, and the smile almost goes of the side of your face. In short, you are pain and torture incarnate. Sarah has forced to do a ghostly waltz. With each jerk of the wires, you feel pain in that body part. Saab giggles. "Now we are going to have fun for the rest of our lives!"
